name: Back to Stone
description: Back to Stone is an action role-playing/hack and slash game using an isometric 3D perspective developed by Hidden Floor. It was published by Neko Entertainment / Big Ben Interactive in Europe and by Graffiti Entertainment / O~3 Entertainment in North America. The music was composed by Frédéric "Elmobo" Motte. It was released for the Game Boy Advance on December 14, 2006.
